subject: Re: Stella dev request and bug fixes
preview: Hi Heath,  I thought I did share it with you. I'll resend to you now. Apologies if that was my oversight.  Thanks Anita  Get Outlook for iOS

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

I thought I did share it with you. I'll resend to you now. Apologies if that was my oversight.

Thanks
Anita

Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Anita, 

Apologies, I was waiting for the brief regarding the quote form? Did you send that through?

Hi Heath,

Hope you're well.

Just wanted to see if you and the team had had a chance to pull together a quote for the build out of the claim form so we can see if we wanted to move forward with this piece of work.

Thanks,

Anita

Anita Manchester

Head of Marketing

m 0404 968 482

w http://stellainsurance.com.au/

Hi Lisa, 

Great to hear it's sorted. Here's a 2min video where I show you how to 'flush' these images from Facebook:
https://www.loom.com/share/0b040936bfa14e9080f7ff81ec57b498

And here is the scraper tool I reference in the video:
https://developers.facebook.com/tools/debug/

Hope this helps.

Ignore team, it's magically started working again.

Thanks!

Kind regards,

Lisa Clark

Content Producer

w http://stellainsurance.com.au/

Hi there,

I'm the content producer at Stella, I cloned a video blog then uploaded the new. Video blog for this month. The old Image (of the original cloned blog) is pulling through to Facebook. We had this issue before, and I added Yoast and that fixed it but now it's happening again. Can you shed any light?

Thanks in advance.

Kind regards,

Lisa Clark

Content Producer

w http://stellainsurance.com.au/



NOTICE

This e-mail and any attachments are CONFIDENTIAL and may contain legally privileged information. Ok thanks for clarifying that!

Anita Manchester

Head of Marketing

m 0404 968 482

w http://stellainsurance.com.au/

Hi Anita, 

Yes, that's correct. These will be handled also. The bots all go in the same 'bucket'.

Thanks Heath - It's not the spam submissions we wanted it for it's other insurers botting our quote journey to get pricing. I'm not familiar with either of the solutions so just want to ensure that the one we have covers this off too.

Anita Manchester

Head of Marketing

m 0404 968 482

w http://stellainsurance.com.au/

Hi Anita, 

Yes, confirming our solution should do the trick. These can be an ever-changing battlefield though, so if any spam submissions come through, please let us know ASAP.

Hi Heath,

Also just wanted to close of the reCAPTCHA conversation to ensure the version you've installed does what Renee was requesting.

Thanks

Anita

Anita Manchester

Head of Marketing

m 0404 968 482

w http://stellainsurance.com.au/

Hi Anita, 

Ah ok, sure no probs. 

Regarding icons:

We have formatted this and uploaded them to the Media Manager. Can you please either place them where desired, or let us know where each one needs to go. I could see most of the logical areas where they would load, but didn't want to assume. I have however tested and they should be sized correctly now. Let me know? 

Regarding captcha:

We have added Akismet to your site. This is a premium spam filter that is included as part of our plans. It will definitely help with spam submissions etc. Are you currently experiencing any specific issues, or is this more of a preventative? If you are experiencing issues, let us know and we can put some specific measures in place. FYI you will Akismet setup in the 'Plugins' area. 

Regarding the quote:

Sure, once we see what you need, we can definitely quote on this for you.

Hi Heath,

Apologies - I had meant on this email.

Thanks

Anita

Anita Manchester

Head of Marketing

m 0404 968 482

w http://stellainsurance.com.au/

Hi Heath,

No worries thanks for jumping on it so quickly, we appreciate it.

Thanks for fixing the black dots and the blogs.

I don't use illustrator - we had a designer send them through.

Here is the folder with all of them in it if you can fix them that would be so helpful.

In addition I have a couple more requests and wanted to see if you can provide us a quote estimate for them:

  1. Add background reCAPTCHA
    1. Renee mentioned we had a background reCAPTCHA on our site previously and this helps stop other insurers and sites from botting us. So it's not the one where customers have to say they aren't a robot but it works in the background.


  1. Quote on building out a claim form for us. We've had the design done and I've just requested for this to be given to me so I can share with you.



Thanks

Anita

Anita Manchester

Head of Marketing

m 0404 968 482

w http://stellainsurance.com.au/

Hi Anita,

Thanks for your patience with this weird one! 

Yes we had kind of come to that conclusion (like you have detailed from the dev's). Have a look now, we have added the Classic Editor (which hides the Gutenberg editor) and enables you to be able to a new post (as you would expect). 

So the flow would be:

  1. Click on Posts
  2. Click on Add New
  3. Enter the Post title
  4. Click on Edit with Elementor 
Essentially this means that you don't need to go through the duplication process. Does that work better for you?

Regarding the black dot lines, these have been removed.

Regarding the icons, I suspect you are loading in an icon of a different (taller) size. They all need to be the same vertical height. If you like, please send through one of the icons you would like to change and I can do a screen record on how to do this. Do you use Illustrator (or similar) for this? Or you can send them all through and we can whiz through them for you.

Hi Heath,

We did have some communication from the guys who built it and this was what they sent over… which is making me think it's a set up issue?

Let me know your thoughts.

Thanks

Anita

See below:

Please find below revised instructions for cloning and editing a post as a draft:

1. On the 'Posts' page, clone a previous post to create a draft

2. Hover over the new draft and click 'Edit with Elementor'

3. To edit the content of the post, edit the content within Elementor as before

4. To edit the title, excerpt, and featured image, click the small grey gear icon on the bottom left of the Elementor panel. This should make the text in the red part of the panel say 'Post Settings'.

5. IMPORTANT: If you want to save as Draft without publishing the post, make sure to click the green up arrow icon that is next to the 'Publish' button at the bottom of the panel, then click 'Save Draft'. You will have to refresh the Elementor editor page to see the changes you just made.

6. To edit tags and post date, find the post in the 'Posts' page, hover over the post you want to edit, and click on 'Quick Edit'.

Anita Manchester

Head of Marketing

m 0404 968 482

w http://stellainsurance.com.au/

Hi Anita, 

Just a quick update, we have been able to replicate the issue you having publishing blogs. Very weird, we are trying to get to the bottom of it now. 

I'll keep you updated.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Hope you had a lovely weekend.

We have a couple of items that we need help with on the Stella site and wondered if it's a case of simply emailing through the request here.

  1. Black dots on the 'Get a quick quote ' button on home page

When you click the button some black dot appear around the edges of the button and we'd like these removed.


  1. Icons

I need to replace some icons on the home page and when I try to do it they aren't rendering to the correct size pushing down the content. I was wondering if you could sho me how to fix this from happening.


  1. We've been trying to publish a couple of new blogs and every time we drop the content, images, tags and try to save it won't save and reverts back to what was in the template. This has only been an issue since Friday last week so not sure if it's got anything to do with the hosting switch over or whether that's just a coincidence.

If you could please let me know next steps to quote time to get these resolved that would be great - and if this is how you usually receive thee requests too.

Best wishes,
Anita

Anita Manchester

Head of Marketing

Level 15, 50 Pitt St, Sydney NSW 2000

m 0404 968 482

e anita@stellainsurance.com.au

w stellainsurance.com.au
